thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Roland Flaig

author: Roland Flaig
title: Roland Flaig
text:
Upon booking my return trips, I was called by FN agent and was told that the price no longer existed. I found this odd as I've used FN numerous times and never had this happen.
Friends of ours booked the exact flights about 30 minutes after me and paid the advertised price.
I immediately called FN and the agent was able to cancel the original booking and rebook my flights at the advertised rate.
Thank you very much!!
